name: Rollout
steps: 1. Grip the ab wheel or bar with the hands and start in a standing position with the wheel by your feet and arms and legs straight.
2. Slowly roll the wheel forward in a controlled manner, stretching out the torso as far as you can.
3. Stop when fully stretched and pause for a moment.
4. Return to the starting position and repeat.
benifits: Reduce your potential for back pain
